alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 9:34AM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Piute, Garfield, Iron, Kane and Sevier Counties. .Warm temperatures and snowmelt will continue to result in increased river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet, minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. At 4.3 feet, moderate flooding will affect fields, roads and bridges along low lying stretches of the Sevier River. Additionally, structures in low lying areas will receive flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 3.6 feet. - The Sevier River at Hatch has been rising this morning. - Forecast...The river will remain above action stage to near flood stage through the week. The river is forecast to remain near or above flood stage through at least the middle of the month. Moderate flooding is possible midweek next week. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM MDT.
